Thanks02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>How can I ever thank you?<sp:5:1:0> Oh! Everyone
likes money! It isn't much, but I hope it
conveys my gratitude.
Talk01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>To start...<sp:5:1:0>did you know that there's
actually a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> right nearby?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>There's an opening in the ground north
of us that leads into it.<sp:0:4:0>I didn't find many ingredients in there
when I poked my head in, but I did see
a fair share of <clr:0000>ore deposits<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Break one of those with a <clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff> or
something and you're in for a treat.<sp:0:4:0>There's flint for starting fires, <sp:5:0:0>rock salt
for seasoning your cooking...<sp:5:0:0>and luminous
stones and gems to sell for high prices!
<snd:Understand_00>Around here, caves are the only place
to find <clr:0000>ore deposits<clr:ffff> too. <sp:5:1:0>If you find a
cave, don't think twice about going in.
Thanks03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Here's a little something to thank you for
saving me.<sp:5:0:0> It's the least I can do!
Talk01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>There's an opening in the ground north
of here that leads into a<clr:0000> cave<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If you break one of the ore deposits in
there with a <clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff> or something, you're
in for a treat.<sp:0:4:0>There's flint for starting fires, rock salt for
seasoning your cooking...<sp:5:0:0>and luminous
stones and gems to sell for high prices!
<snd:LaughS_01>Around here, caves are the only place
to find <clr:0000>ore deposits<clr:ffff> too. <sp:5:1:0>If you find a
cave, don't think twice about going in.
Talk02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>For instance, ah... <sp:5:1:0>There's an opening in
the ground north of here that leads into
a<clr:0000> cave<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>If you break one of the ore deposits in
there with a <clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff> you can get ore,
obviously. But more than that...<sp:0:4:0>There's flint for starting fires, rock salt for
seasoning your cooking...<sp:5:0:0>and luminous
stones and gems to sell for high prices!
<snd:Understand_00>So if you find an <clr:0000>ore deposit<clr:ffff> in a cave,
make sure to break it!
Talk02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>If you see an ore deposit in a cave and
break it with a <clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff>, I think you'll be
pleased with what you'll get.<sp:0:4:0>There's flint for starting fires, rock salt for
seasoning your cooking...<sp:5:0:0>and luminous
stones and gems to sell for high prices!
<snd:LaughS_01>So if you find an <clr:0000>ore deposit<clr:ffff> in a cave,
make sure to break it!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>Whew... <sp:5:0:0>These monsters are a real pain
in the neck.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease_01>Thanks for the rescue!<sp:5:1:0> Fighting's never
really been my thing.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>I'm saved!<sp:5:1:0> Good thing you arrived when
you did. I may have bitten off more than
I could chew there.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>Thanks!<sp:5:1:0> Things were looking a little dicey,
but you pulled me out of the fire!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>It's like you eat scary monsters for
breakfast.<sp:5:0:0> Your skills are something else!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>It's not every day you look death in the
face and manage to walk away.<sp:5:1:0> But now
my quest for ingredients can continue!
Talk06_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>Are you familiar with <clr:0000>hearty truffles<clr:ffff>?
They're valuable and delicious fungi.<sp:0:4:0>You used to be able to find them on the
surface, but lately, I've only been able to
find them in <clr:0000>caves and wells<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_00>Hearty truffles are black and tend not to
stand out,<sp:5:1:0> so it's important to keep a
watchful eye out when searching for them.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Though rumor has it that a few lucky
people have stumbled onto <clr:0000>white hearty
truffles<clr:ffff> that have grown to a massive size.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>What a blessing it would be to cook with
such a fantastic ingredient!
Talk99_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>Oh, hello! <sp:5:1:0>We meet again!<sp:0:4:0>I came here because I heard <clr:0000>there were
caves<clr:ffff> in this area. You, too, I imagine?<sp:0:4:0>Well, in any case... <sp:5:1:0>There's no better way
to commemorate our reunion than with
some fresh cave advice.
AfterFailed:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Stick a fork in me, I'm done. <sp:5:1:0>We can chat
when the world stops spinning...
Talk06_01:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>Hearty truffles<clr:ffff> are rare fungi that only
grow in <clr:0000>caves and wells<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>They're black and tend to blend into their
surroundings, <sp:5:1:0>so you have to keep your
eyes peeled when searching for them.
That said, I've heard some people have
found even bigger <clr:0000>white hearty truffles<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Cooking with an ingredient like that would
be the dream of any chef.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Seriously? You wanna talk now?! <sp:5:1:0>Help me
get through this, and then we can chat!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Wh-what is this monster?!<sp:5:1:0> I can't fight it...<sp:5:0:0>
I need to run!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Urgh... <sp:5:0:0>It feels like I...<sp:5:0:0>just caught a little
glimpse of the afterlife there.

I should've prepared for monsters before
I headed out.
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>My prayers have been answered!<sp:5:1:0>
I've got a little monster problem here.
Would you lend me a hand?
GoodBye00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>My name is Savrey. <sp:5:1:0>I'm a traveling chef,
constantly on the lookout for the freshest
ingredients the <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> can offer.<sp:0:4:0>If you need to do some cooking yourself,<sp:5:1:0>
you're welcome to use my pot.<sp:5:1:0> I'm not
sure how else to repay you.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>Wait, maybe I do! <sp:5:1:0>I can share all that I've
learned while going through the caves!<sp:0:4:0>Caves are full of valuable ingredients and
ores.<sp:5:0:0> Think of them as Hyrule's natural
treasure chests!
Trust me, knowing your caves can be a
major boon for travelers.
Talk03_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Caves are tricky things. <sp:5:0:0>Sometimes
passages—or even the entrance—can
be completely blocked by rocks.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>If that happens, the only way through is
through. You just have to <clr:0000>smash those
pesky rocks<clr:ffff>!
<snd:Understand_00>Regular swords and spears won't do
you any good though. You'll need a
<clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff>-like implement with a blunt tip.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So it never hurts to be prepared to smash
some rocks before you enter a cave.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>And hey, a blocked path isn't all bad.
Sometimes you'll even find ore in the
rocks you've smashed!
Talk100:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>I hope our paths will cross again
somewhere. <sp:5:1:0>So long, and safe travels!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>Owww... <sp:5:0:0>That one is definitely going
to bruise.<sp:5:1:0>

I never thought I'd miss washing
dishes. <sp:5:0:0>Urgh...
Talk03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>If you're exploring a cave and find your
path blocked by <clr:0000>rocks<clr:ffff>, you need to <clr:0000>smash<clr:ffff>
your way through!
And to do so, a <clr:0000>hammer<clr:ffff>-like implement
with something blunt on the end is
absolutely essential.
<snd:LaughS_01>Sometimes you'll even find weapons and
ore in the rocks you've smashed. <sp:5:1:0>So it
never hurts to have a hammer on hand!
Talk04_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Funny thing about the rocks that block
off the passages in a cave... Different
<clr:0000>rocks have different toughness<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The harder ones take multiple hammer
blows to break through.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Given that, I should probably prepare a
more <clr:0000>powerful hammer<clr:ffff> for myself.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Trouble_00>Maybe I could replace the head of my
hammer with something else. <sp:5:1:0>Is there
some <clr:0000>hard material<clr:ffff> I could use?
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Maybe this home-cooked meal can convey
my gratitude! <sp:5:1:0>It's not much, but I hope
you'll enjoy it.
Talk05_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>Have you ever seen <clr:0000>glowing cave fish<clr:ffff>
flitting about in cave pools? How about
<clr:0000>brightcap<clr:ffff> mushrooms?
Both are rare organisms found only in
caves and wells.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Though I suppose their rarity is less
important than their glowiness.<sp:0:4:0>If you cook and eat either one of them,
they'll make your body <clr:0000>glow<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Isn't that neat? <sp:5:1:0>It's just a slight glow and
not very useful for everyday life, but it
could be handy for exploring caves!
Thanks01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>As a chef, there's no better way for me
to thank you than with food. <sp:5:1:0>I hope this
tickles your taste buds!
GoodBye00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>We meet again.<sp:0:4:0>I'm here because I heard <clr:0000>there are caves<clr:ffff>
in this area. <sp:5:0:0>You, too, I take it? <sp:5:0:0>No?<sp:0:4:0>In any case,<sp:5:1:0> I'm happy to see you and
ready to share some more cave info!
Talk05_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>Have you seen <clr:0000>glowing cave fish<clr:ffff> or
<clr:0000>brightcaps<clr:ffff> in your travels?<sp:0:4:0>They're rare ingredients that you can only
find in caves and wells. <sp:5:0:0>If you cook and
eat them, they'll make your body <clr:0000>glow<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>The glowing is faint, but it could be useful
for navigating in the dark. It's worth a try!
Talk99:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hello there! <sp:5:1:0>Are you a traveler too? My
name is Savrey. <sp:5:1:0>I'm a wandering chef.<sp:0:4:0>I wander from place to place, searching
<clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>for uniquely delicious ingredients.<sp:0:4:0>As we both seem to be like-minded
explorers, you're welcome to use my
cooking pot whenever you like.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>And I bet the things I've learned in
my cave searches could come in handy
on your journey! Mind if I share?
Caves are chock-full of valuable ores
and ingredients. <sp:5:0:0>They're like nature's
treasure chests!
If you're not savvy to the joys of a good
cave, you're not traveling to the fullest!
